mapper.select:

SELECT
FROM course c LEFT JOIN course_popularity cp ON c.id = cp.course_id WHERE c.status = 'approved' ORDER BY COALESCE(cp.view_count, 0) DESC, c.created_at DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.update: INSERT INTO course_popularity (course_id, view_count) VALUES (#{id}, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE view_count = view_count + 1
